author: Library of Congress

organization.description: Group for Library Linked Data Policy described at: http://esw.w3.org/TaskForces/CommunityProjects/LinkedLibraryData/Datasets/CKANmetainformation Cloud (partial) available at http://semantic.ckan.net/group/?group=http://ckan.net/group/lld. The brightly coloured circles represent the packages that are part of the LLD group. They grey circles represent packages that are connected to but are not members of this group (they typically are members of the general LOD Cloud group). The size of the circles and the thickness of the lines are related to the size of the data and the number of outward links (logarithmic) respectively.
organization.title: Library Linked Data
organization.name: lld

name: library-of-congress-name-authority-file
notes:
Bulk downloads of the Library of Congress Name Authority File (NAF).  The current bulk download is only MADS/RDF.  A SKOS/RDF download will be available in the near future.  Two serializations are offered:  n-triples and RDF/XML.

The data dumps are very much a work in progress. Please report problems, issues, and wishes on the ID.LOC.GOV listserv:

<http://listserv.loc.gov/cgi-bin/wa?SUBED1=ID&A=1>

### License

From the [about page][]:

[about page]: http://id.loc.gov/about/

The Library of Congress has prepared this vocabulary terminology system and is making it available as a public domain data set. While it has attempted to minimize inaccuracies and defects in the data and services furnished, THE LIBRARY OF CONGRESS IS PROVIDING THIS DATA AND THESE SERVICES "AS IS" AND DISCLAIMS ANY AND ALL WARRANTIES, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.
title: Library of Congress Name Authority File (NAF)
